description: Updates an Amazon Web Services Migration Hub Refactor Spaces route.

parameters.name: ActivationState
parameters.description: If set to ACTIVE, traffic is forwarded to this route's service after the route is updated.

parameters.name: ApplicationIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the application within which the route is being updated.

parameters.name: EnvironmentIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the environment in which the route is being updated.

parameters.name: RouteIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the route to update.

nested_items.name: ApplicationId
nested_items.description: The ID of the application in which the route is being updated.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the route. The format for this ARN is ``arn:aws:refactor-spaces:region:account-id:resource-type/resource-id ``. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that indicates when the route was last updated.

nested_items.name: RouteId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the route.

nested_items.name: ServiceId
nested_items.description: The ID of service in which the route was created. Traffic that matches this route is forwarded to this service.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of the route.
